qas.question: In what decade did developers extend the capabilities of videoconferencing to more devices?
What allows people in remote locations the ability to video-conference with colleagues far away?
What is one example of an application that videoconferencing manufacturers have begun to offer?
What type of applications have videoconferencing manufacturers begun to offer?
What is an example of a place that videoconferencing can be used today?
What have moblie collaboration system manufacturers provided?

plausible_answers.text: extended the capabilities of video conferencing systems beyond the boardroom

qas.question: What has the use of video done in the 2010's?

plausible_answers.text: extended the capabilities of video conferencing systems

qas.question: What have videoconferencing developers created for use with off shore oil rigs?

plausible_answers.text: the ability to view and discuss issues with colleagues thousands of miles away

qas.question: What does still image streaming allow?
